website_summaries.verdict: These feature the classic Hollywood design with just enough accents to give them an upscale look. Affordable price point, but buyers should seek authentication.
pros: Arrives with cleaning cloth and case
cons: Some missing pieces, damage reported on arrival
Strong possibility of counterfeit or knock-off products

customer_reviews.title: I'm buying another pair for myself!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend, and now I'm considering buying myself a pair. :) My cousin bought the same ones last year from a store so I compared those to the ones I just got, they look authentic. All original packaging. Thick, good quality glasses, black lens with the lens numbers on them. Just beautiful glasses. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Barcode is covered by amazon in the back of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is real authentic.. The only struggle I had is to check the item barcode . Amazon cover the actual barcode in the box . That’s why it’s so hard to check the numbers online if you are going to check the authenticity of the product. Well all and all it’s real and authentic.. and give the seller a 5 star coz they were very honest . Thanks and I give 5stars for them and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RicoAdams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome frames
customer_reviews.text: I bought these just for the frames and had them turned into prescription glasses. This was a good deal. These are better looking than any sunglasses I can get at the optometrist and cheaper, even with insurance. And I don't feel bad about throwing away the lenses they came with because those lenses were not good at all. Comes with a Versace box, Versace hard case and the usual accouterments. Five stars for the frames only.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome with similiar look to ones that demand high $ on resale market.
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves my Similiar shades but mine have the DV for Donatella Versace with 1/2 face on each side. I bought 2 pair in different shades years ago and they had sold out worldwide in just days. These are the closest to that design I’ve ever seen and maybe not quite as nice the look is amazing and quality is still wonderful. Price is amazing as mine were over 250 for first pair and 400 on resale market to get others these are great for men or women and my guy was thrilled to have gotten them.
customer_reviews.author: Troynnc

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Don’t know if they’re real
customer_reviews.text: Good value. I’m still not sure if they’re authentic. I bought these shades to replace some old Versace seeds that I had. The same ones to be exact. Those ones were authentic I had bought them years ago at Sunglass hut. Check out the comparison side-by-side in the pictures. The ones I bought from Amazon do not have a Versace authentication card. The lenses on the new ones are much darker and they do not have a polarized stamp on the lense like the old ones do. But they are polarized lenses. I’ll wear them...
customer_reviews.author: Augustine Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunglasses!! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: The quality and details of this sunglasses are excellent. They are authentic. They feel very solid and high quality. I definitely recommended this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these glasses , but unfortunately I'm about a month in with them and the medussa emblem as well as the arms of the glasses have loosened and widened tremendously. I have tried to tighten then , but it just continues to revert back. The usage on these sunglasses has been very minimal this month, so I doubt it would be from normal wear an tear.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. If they aren't authentic I can't tell the difference. Compared the. To the same glasses at Macy's and couldn't tell the difference. They are very big so make sure you get the right size for you. I put prescription lenses in them and love them.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: This sunglasses are the best I love the way they feel and I love ...
customer_reviews.text: This sunglasses are the best I love the way they feel and I love everything about them. I will defenetly get another pair of this brand. This is the second pair is they haven't let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Chavez

customer_reviews.title: These are authentic. We compared them at Nordstrom and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are authentic. We compared them at Nordstrom and Sunglass Hut. They come with everything: book, cloth, case, box. My fiancé even checked the authenticity. Just keep in mind these aren’t polarized.
customer_reviews.author: Professional Shopper Girl

customer_reviews.title: Classic Versace Shades
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality sunglasses. They look and feel authentic. I did not get an authentication card with them, but I did receive a warranty card. They are also very good at blocking really bright sunlight. I will keep these and would order them again. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: AKP

customer_reviews.title: Versace Black Stunners
customer_reviews.text: Quality case and glasses just as described and price is great and do recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rihanna Marzano

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I never read the description and relize it was womens glasses after seeing them I planned on returning them but things came up and never had the time. Also the versace symbol came with a scrape on it so that sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett B.

customer_reviews.title: Love Em
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are the BOMB! Great fit and excellent look. . . Phenomenally priced! Love them to the moon and back!
customer_reviews.author: Phlipphlop

customer_reviews.title: Versace Versace Versace
customer_reviews.text: I liked these a lot. The only issue which is very slight is that when the arms of the sunglasses are open there is still a slight hairline of space between the side arms nd the area where they meet the frame. On a sunny day you can still see a hairline of light coming in from the side.
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl2019

customer_reviews.title: I did my research. I wanted authentic..
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love them! Authentic all the way. They are dark Lens as well. Thank you Vision Group!
customer_reviews.author: Onesunflower97

customer_reviews.title: You get what you buy
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses fit very well. No scratches were found. The lenses are very dark. I have been using polarized sunglasses for years and now that I have this pair, I’m actually liking them. I just got them today and I will follow up with another review in 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: it's Nieto!

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought these for my husband and he absolutely loves them and they look amazing on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are so beautiful! Very dark lenses
customer_reviews.text: They are so beautiful! Very dark lenses. High quality. They feel expensive! Larger than anticipated and that’s a good thing! The Medusa heads are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: pv

customer_reviews.title: I love them just what I was looking for going to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them just what I was looking for going to buy full face pair also. They were the same as in pictures and came well protected in a nice box. VERSACE VERSACE VERSACE Lol. 😊
customer_reviews.author: timothy settle

customer_reviews.title: Its authentic you guys!
customer_reviews.text: Its the real deal! I typed the CLG code in versace.certilogo.com and its authentic. Thank God! It comes with the box, heavy case, 2 versace sunglass wipes and international warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jcas

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and light
customer_reviews.text: They fit like I expected, a little larger than RayBans, but they are light, the lenses are dark enough to block out a bright sunny day but also easy enough to see indoors. I had to get mine fitted but other than that I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love them, and the price was great too!
customer_reviews.author: donwonquan

customer_reviews.title: Fits the face perfect. The gold head on the side is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits the face perfect. The gold head on the side is perfect, not to crazy out there but anyone with style or familiar with Versace will notice. They also have some decent weight to them which I thought was a good thing, as far as Quality materials
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: Husband broke his brown pair that he had for years. Wanted a new pair in black and to our surprise Amazon had it. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These shaded have the look of style class and swag! My only minor critique would be they become a little loose which I think is easily corrected. I plan on buying another pair soon. Versace Rocks!

customer_reviews.title: A little big
customer_reviews.text: I love the way that make me look I would have made them a little smaller though.

customer_reviews.title: A piece of beauty
customer_reviews.text: This is a Beauty. Even nicer than the picture. It’s also very comfortable. The clarity of lenses is much better than other equally expensive shade I have (including Ray-ban).

customer_reviews.title: Love these...  These shades are what I've wanted to get for a long time....
customer_reviews.text: Just got my prescription on these, and I love them!!!!!!!!!!! Great item, and great store which shipped these out very quick.

customer_reviews.title: and I am extremely satisfied. Brand new glasses
customer_reviews.text: Got my glasses on time, and I am extremely satisfied. Brand new glasses, prolly just last season or something because it came with the serial numbers and authenticity. They are super sharp too. They are heavier glasses and require a big head like mine.

product_meta.title: Versace sunglasses VE4275 GB1/87 Acetate Black - Gold Black 58-18-140
product_meta.description: Straight from the Spring/Summer '14 catwalk, this squared fashionable men's shape features a large Medusa icon at each temple. This bold look will certainly grab onlookers' attention
feature_bullets: LOOKS BEST ON THESE FACE SHAPES: OVAL, ROUND
